docs.snippet: Tony Gonzalez is in and Dan Marino and Shannon Sharpe are out of the network’s N.F.L. studio show....
docs.lead_paragraph: Tony Gonzalez is in and Dan Marino and Shannon Sharpe are out of the network’s N.F.L. studio show.
docs.abstract: CBS Sports changes lineup of its NFL Today pregame show, hiring Tony Gonzalez and parting with Shannon Sharpe and Dan Marino; other football news noted.

headline.main: CBS Drops Two and Adds Gonzalez to ‘NFL Today’

docs.snippet: A middle-school football coach was charged Wednesday with first-degree murder in the death of a 10-year-old girl who was snatched off a street just blocks from her southwest Missouri home as several residents watched in horror....
docs.lead_paragraph: A middle-school football coach was charged Wednesday with first-degree murder in the death of a 10-year-old girl who was snatched off a street just blocks from her southwest Missouri home as several residents watched in horror.

headline.main: Football Coach Charged in Missouri Girl's Death
headline.print_headline: Football Coach Charged in Missouri Girl's Death

docs.snippet: The quarterback Kain Colter offered more than four hours of testimony before the National Labor Relations Board, insisting he was on campus to play football....
docs.lead_paragraph: The quarterback Kain Colter offered more than four hours of testimony before the National Labor Relations Board, insisting he was on campus to play football.
docs.abstract: Northwestern University quarterback Kain Colter, leader of football team's petition to form a union, presents more than four hours of testimony before the National Labor Board; insists that his primary role at university is that of football player, rather than student, and that position amounts to a job.

headline.main: Northwestern Quarterback Makes His Case for Players’ Union
headline.print_headline: Northwestern Quarterback Makes His Case for Players’ Union

docs.snippet: Major colleges run their football teams just like those in the NFL, relying on players to generate millions of dollars in revenue, an economist testified Wednesday before a federal agency that will decide whether Northwestern football players may ...
docs.lead_paragraph: Major colleges run their football teams just like those in the NFL, relying on players to generate millions of dollars in revenue, an economist testified Wednesday before a federal agency that will decide whether Northwestern football players may form the first union for college athletes in U.S. history.

headline.main: Economist: College Game Like NFL _ but for No Pay
headline.print_headline: Economist: College Game Like NFL _ but for No Pay

docs.snippet: Midfielder Darren Fletcher, who returned to Manchester United's first team in December after a long battle with ulcerative colitis, has been recalled to the Scotland squad for next month's friendly in Poland....
docs.lead_paragraph: Midfielder Darren Fletcher, who returned to Manchester United's first team in December after a long battle with ulcerative colitis, has been recalled to the Scotland squad for next month's friendly in Poland.

headline.main: United Midfielder Fletcher Back for Scotland After Illness
headline.print_headline: United Midfielder Fletcher Back for Scotland After Illness

docs.snippet: Editors: Penn State offensive linemen John Urschel will routinely provide a look at his journey leading up to the May 8 NFL draft in a series of diary entries. The all-Big Ten, third-team AP All-American has a Master's degree in math and was award...
docs.lead_paragraph: Editors: Penn State offensive linemen John Urschel will routinely provide a look at his journey leading up to the May 8 NFL draft in a series of diary entries. The all-Big Ten, third-team AP All-American has a Master's degree in math and was awarded the William V. Campbell Trophy as college football's top scholar-athlete. The 6-foot-3, 315-pound guard opens with a look at his preparation for the scouting combine, which begins Thursday in Indianapolis:

headline.main: John Urschel's Diary: Road to the NFL Draft
headline.print_headline: John Urschel's Diary: Road to the NFL Draft

headline.main: Embrace Challenge of Brazil, Says France Coach Deschamps
headline.print_headline: Embrace Challenge of Brazil, Says France Coach Deschamps
